document_data.name: Mordenkainen's Protection From Insects And Arachnids
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mordenkainen's protection from insects and arachnids''''' was an uncommon protection [[spell]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster was given protection from arachnid and insect species. This included swarming insects, scorpions and spiders. The spell also offered protection from the giant-sized version of insects, such as [[giant scorpion]]s. Additionally, the caster was protected from the venom from arachnid or insect bites or stings.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], an insect encased in [[amber]].
